name: supersnake
description:
snake was fun. supersnake is insane!

It takes two to play this game, don't be shy, invite your friends and battle to see how's best in the snake game.

You can play using directional arrows for player one and WASD for player two. BUT THERE IS NOTHING NEW ABOUT THAT! SO... You can also play with a playstation 4 controller (it might be a little buggy though, we are working on it). That's right, snake on controller!

*Work in progress! Currently working on:

  • Online multiplayer;
  • XBOX controller integration;
  • AI for single player;
  • Game over message with winner.

Follow us at:

  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dreamroadproductions
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/dreamroadprod
  • Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/dreamroadproductions

** READ THIS ** WARNING: The game might not be recommended for people with epilepsy. ** READ THIS **

The game is still in development. Any feedback is welcome.

MUSIC: http://www.bensound.com
